Begin Row: K2, knit into the next st in the row below, then slip the stitch itself onto the right-hand needle, k2 tog, psso*
Repeat: knit into the next stitch in the row below, knit the stitch itself, knit again into the row below at left of stitch (3 stitches made from 1), sl 1-k2-tog-psso
End Row: knit into the next stitch in the row below, knit the stitch itself, k1

Repeat: knit into the next stitch in the row below, knit the stitch itself, knit again into the row below at left of stitch (3 stitches made from 1), sl 1-k2-tog-psso
End Row: knit into the next stitch in the row below, knit the stitch itself, knit again into the row below at left of stitch (3 stitches made from 1), sl 1, k1, psso, k1
